name: Hide Your Butts
description:
From 3 to 8 people online multiplayer game with the goal of multiple people trying to control their body limbs so you can hide behind a wall cutout, while one of your friends tries to catch you.

Also includes a singleplayer mode where you try to squeeze through a body shaped cutouts in styrofoam walls, if you get knocked into the water you fail, if you stay on land you move on to the next wall, if none of your body parts even touch the wall, you get a 'perfect'.

Features:
  • Finger-twisting controls
  • Standalone singleplayer mode
  • From 3 to 8 people multiplayer mode with a public lobby list
